sp.@list: 20 : 20% boost to all parameters | 10 : Hugely boosts Def relative to how low remaining HP is (+1% boost per 1% HP lost, 100% boost max) | 30 : 100% boost to Spark damage | 20 : Spark damage boosts BC, HC drop rate (15% boost) | 50 : Raises normal hit amount (+1 to each hit count) | 30 : Adds BC drop rate boost for 3 turns effect to BB/SBB (30% boost) | 50 : Adds slight BB gauge boost during Spark for 3 turns effect to BB/SBB (1~2 BC fill) | 60 : Enhances BB/SBB/UBB's Spark damage boost effect (+30% boost, 130% boost total on BB/SBB, 280% boost total on UBB) | 50 : Enhances the 'Spark damage restore HP' effect of SBB (+100 HP boost, 600~700 HP healed total)
